content: Is anyone using the mobile version of Zulip on iPhone? I can't seem to log in and there is no way to create a new account on the mobile app. If you have got it going, what is the correct domain? I tried 'chat.fhir.org' as well as just 'zulip'.

I've tried the same thing, with the same results, @Michael Osborne - just tried it again earlier today, actually. I'm not sure what the issue would be, but it would be good to find a solution. So far I haven't figured out what it is.

I sent an email to the zulip group about the broken bitbucket integration - they were pretty responsive and apparently the problem is now fixed - so worth giving them a hoy (ironically they use a googlegroup!)
zulip-devel@googlegroups.com
